::Feline::
"STOP! DON"T SHOOT! HotRod is on our side now.  He's with me." She 
stepped in front of HotRod and looked at Unitron. "He's now with us. 
Lower your weapon please."  She gave him a warm smile and purred 
softly, turning on her charms and hoping Untron would calm down a bit.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Unitron:
> 
> 
> 
> The three robots headed for the Alliance bridge, Unitron wanting to 
talk 
> about certain things, and the other two...well, they were just 
crazy.
> 
> Unitron stopped as he saw Hot Rod, only his colors were different.  
A rage 
> and hate boiled up in him, and he raised his hands to stop the 
other two 
> robots.
> 
> "What!" Nemesis said loudly.
> 
> "That is Hot Rod.  An Autobot...or rather, a Maximal.  Or an 
impostor."
> 
> "Yeah, whazzzz your point?" Scattershot said quickly.
> 
> "Hot Rod killed Unicron.  He's a good guy, to make it easy to 
understand for 
> you."
> 
> "Reheheheally?" 
> 
> "Yes."
> 
> "In that case..." Nemesis Enforcer drew his rapid-firing laser 
rifle, taking 
> aim at Hot Rod's torso.
> 
> "Well...I reckon this varmint better get hog-tied and eaten by wild 
banshees, 
> partners."
> 
> The other two Alliance members looked over to Scattershot.
> 
> "Good one!" Nemesis said, high-fiving Scattershot, as Scattershot 
took out 
> his automatic rifle, taking aim at Hot Rod.
> 
> Unitron could see Feline with Hot Rod, but ignored it. He raised 
both of his 
> laser rifles at Hot Rod, pulling the trigger twice for each weapon, 
his 
> hatred for Autobots in general, and especially Hot Rod overriding 
his logic 
> circuitry.
